jñāna viśeṣa tvāt iti

santara iti rāma ādi rati ādeḥ iti arthaḥ
tad abhedena āropa viṣayaḥ sāmājika rati ādiḥ eva vibhāva ādi niṣṭha svādana ākhya vyāpāra janya āsvāda viṣayaḥ rasaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: sītādidarśanādijo rāmādiratyādyudbodho hi parimito laukiko nāṭyakāvyadarśanādeḥ sāntarāyaśca,
analyzed: sītā ādi darśana ādi jaḥ rāma ādi rati ādi udbodhaḥ hi parimitaḥ laukikaḥ nāṭya kāvya darśana ādeḥ sa antarāyaḥ ca
tasmāt katham rasa rūpa tām iyāt
ka rasasya etad dharma tritaya vilakṣaṇa dharmmaka tvāt
anukarttṛ gata tvam ca asya nirasyati
vijña priyā
vi ṭa anukartā iti anukartā naṭaḥ eva
śikṣā abhyāsa ādi mātreṇa rāghava ādeḥ svarūpa tām
darśayan narttakaḥ nā eva rasasya āsvādakaḥ bhavet
vijña priyā

original: (vi, ṭha) sa yadā kāvyārthabhāvakaḥ syāttadā sopi sāmājiko bhavedityāha---kiṃceti /

original: yadi punarnaṭo 'pi kāvyārthabhāvanayā rāmādisvarūpatāmātmano darśayet tadā so 'pi sabhyamadhya eva gaṇyate /
analyzed: yadi punar naṭaḥ pi kāvya artha bhāvanayā rāma ādi sva rūpa tām ātmanaḥ darśayet tadā saḥ u pi sabhya madhye eva gaṇyate

original: (vi, ḍa) yadyapyuktarītyā rasasya sākṣāt kriyamāṇatvaṃ kāryatvaṃ kādācitkatvena bhaviṣyadvartamānatvaṃ
analyzed: yadi api ukta rītyā rasasya sākṣāt kriyamāṇa tvam kārya tvam kādācitkatvena bhaviṣyat vartamāna tvam

original: sādhayituṃ sākṣāt kriyamāṇghaṭādito 'pi vailakṣaṇyasādhanena kautukādasākṣāt kriyamāṇatvaṃ
analyzed: sādhayitum vailakṣaṇya sādhanena kautukāt asākṣāt kriyamāṇa tvam

kautukāt vaktum prathamam
na ayam jñeyaḥ iti arthaḥ
jñāpya tva jñeya tvayoḥ samaniyata tvāt yathāśrutam eva vā
ajñeya tvam ca atra ghaṭa ādi sādhāraṇa itara sākṣātkāra viṣaya tvām
jñeya tvasya kevala anvayi tvena tad abhāva asambhavāt

pratitya vyabhicārataḥ

anyadā tu rati ādiḥ eva

original: kecittu tatsamakālotpannaṃ vyañjanayāpi tādṛśaṃ samūhālambanānantaraṃ jāyate,

original: (lo, a) rasasyeti--nahi vibhāvādijñānakāraṇakamityanantaraṃ tataścānupalabhyamānakāraṇāntarasya rasasya na kāryatvamiti bhāvaḥ /

original: yadi rasaḥ kāryaḥ syāttadā vibhāvādijñānakāraṇaka eva syāt /

original: “pratīyamānaḥ prathamaṃ pratyekaṃ heturucyate“ityanena pratyekasya hetutvoktyā tatkāryatve vipratipattyabhāvāt /

rasa pratīti kāle

original: (vi, tha) kāraṇajñānasya sthitiḥ kāryajñānasyotpattiriti tu na sambhavatyeva /

tat āha jñāna tad kārya jñānayoḥ iti
atra jñāna iti prakṛta abhiprayeṇa eva

nahi candana sparśa jñānam tad janya sukha jñānañca ekadā sambhavati
vijña priyā
kāraṇa kārya jñānayoḥ yugapad utpatti asaṃbhavam darśayati na hi candana iti
rasasya ca vibhāva ādi samūha ālambana ātmaka tayā eva pratīteḥ na vibhāva ādi jñāna kāraṇa tvam iti abhiprāyaḥ
vijña priyā
tasmāt rasasya samūha ālambana ātmaka tvam eva

tat eva āha na vibhāvādi iti

original: evaṃ rasasya samūhālambanakāryatvameva khaṇḍitaṃ natu kāryatvam /

original: yadyapi ghaṭādisādhāraṇajñāpyatvasyaiva samūhālambanakāryatvasyaiva cābhāvaḥ prag darśitaḥ,

original: yadyapi tadgrāhakasya nirvikalpakatvābhāvayuktipradarśanenaiva savikalpakasaṃvedyatvaṃ siddhaṃ tathāpi savikalpakasaṃvedyāntarato vailakṣaṇyena  #

na tu kāvya stha śabdena

original: pratyuta tasya tatkāvyasya śabdavācyatve svaśabdavācyatvaṃ doṣa eva vakṣyate /

atra eva kāvyaprakāśa kṛtā api uktam
rasa ādi lakṣaṇaḥ tu arthaḥ svapra iti na vācyaḥ iti

original: savikalpakavedyaṃ padārthāntaraṃ tatkāvyasthaśabdenaiva vācyamiti tato vailakṣaṇyamiti vacanam /

original: sākṣātkārānantaravailakṣaṇyapratipādanāya sākṣātkārarūpasyāpi tatprakāśasya sākṣātkāratvābhāvamapi kautukādāha--nāparokṣa iti /

original: (lo, ṛ) tathābhilāpeti--atrāpi pūrvavat raso na savikalpakarūpa iti /

original: (vi, ya) itthaṃ kiñcit vastutaḥ kiñcicca kautukād vailakṣaṇyamuktvā kīdṛśaṃ tādṛśavilakṣaṇaṃ vastu tat iti pṛcchati;

tat kathayati
tasya adṛṣṭa cara tvāt adṛṣṭa cara tvam bhavati iti āha adṛṣṭa nirūpaṇa iti

vijña priyā

original: (vi, ja) prathamaṃ caturbheda iti---paścāttu dhīrodāttādīnām api dakṣiṇadhṛṣṭatvādibhedasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt /
analyzed: prathamam catur bhedaḥ iti paścāt tu dhīra udātta ādīnām api dakṣiṇa dhṛṣṭa tva ādi bhedasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt
spaṣṭam
tatra dhīra udāttaḥ
avikatthanaḥ kṣamāvān ati gambhīraḥ māhasattvaḥ
stheyān na gūḍha mānaḥ dhīra udāttaḥ dṛḍha vrataḥ kathitaḥ
locanā
stheyān sthirataraḥ
a vikatthanaḥ na ātma ślāghā karaḥ
mahāsattvaḥ harṣa śoka ādi anabhibhūta svabhāvaḥ
nigūḍha mānaḥ vinaya channa garvaḥ
yathārāma yudhiṣṭira ādiḥ
atha dhīroddhataḥ
māyā paraḥ pracaṇḍaḥ capalaḥ haṅkāra darpa bhūyiṣṭhaḥ
ātma ślāghā nirataḥ dhīraiḥ dhora uddhataḥ kathitaḥ
yathā bhīmasena ādiḥ atha dhīra lalitaḥ
niścintaḥ mṛduḥ aniśam kalā paraḥ dhīra lalitaḥ syāt
yathā satna vālya ādau vatsa rāja ādiḥ
atha dhīrapraśāntaḥ
sāmānya guṇaiḥ bhūyān dvija ādikaḥ dhīra praśāntaḥ syāt
vijña priyā
sāmānya guṇaiḥ iti dhīra udātta ādi traya sādhāraṇa guṇaiḥ bhūyāt mahān iti arthaḥ
locanā
ṛ sāmānya guṇa amanu ādi ukta dhṛti kṣamā ādayaḥ
yathā mālatī mādhava ādau mādhava ādiḥ
eṣām ca śṛṅgāra ādi rūpa tve bhedān āha
ebhiḥ dakṣiṇā dhṛṣṭa anukūla śaṭha rūpibhiḥ tu ṣoḍaśadhā
vijña priyā
vi ña ṣoḍaśadhā iti dhīra udātta ādīnām caturṇām dakṣiṇa tva ādi cāturguṇyena ṣoḍaśa tvam

original: tatra teṣāṃ dhīrodāttādīnāṃ pratyekaṃ dakṣiṇadhṛṣṭānukūlaśaṭhatvena ṣoḍaśaprakārā nāyakaḥ /
analyzed: tatra teṣām dhīra udātta ādīnām pratyekam dakṣiṇa dhṛṣṭa anukūla śaṭha tvena ṣoḍaśa prakārāḥ nāyakaḥ

original: eṣu tvanekamahilāsu samarāgo dakṣiṇaḥ kathitaḥ // VisSd_3.35 //
analyzed: eṣu tu aneka mahilāsu sama rāgaḥ dakṣiṇaḥ kathitaḥ
vijña priyā
aneka mahilā iti vyācaṣṭe dvayoḥ tri catuḥ iti
locanā
laḥ ṝ eṣu dakṣiṇa ādiṣu nāyaka madhye
dvayoḥ tri catuḥ prabhṛtiṣu nāyikāsu tulya anurāgaḥ dakṣiṇa nāyakaḥ
yathā
snātā tiṣṭhati kuntaleśvara sutā
vāraḥ ṅga rāja svasuḥ dyūtaiḥ rātriḥ iyam jitā kalamayā
devī prasādya adya ca

original: ityantaḥ purasundarīḥ prati mayā vijñāyā vijñāpite devenāpratipattimūḍhamanasā dvitrāḥ sthitaṃ nāḍikāḥ //
analyzed: iti antar pura sundarīḥ prati mayā vijñāyāḥ vijñāpite devena apratipatti mūḍha manasā dvitrāḥ sthitam nāḍikāḥ
vijña priyā
vi snātā tiṣṭhati iti antar puracara janasya kasmiṃścid iyam uktiḥ

original: anekapatnīsambhogārhā iyaṃ rātririti tatkarmaniyuktasya rājñi nivedanam /
analyzed: aneka patnī sambhoga arhā iyam rātriḥ iti tad karma niyuktasya rājñi nivedanam
kamalayā tad nāmnyā devyā
devī kṛta abhiṣekā
māninyāḥ tasyāḥ adya avaśyam prasādanam
dvitrāḥ iti

original: sarvāsu anurāgasāmyena kasyāpyupekṣānarhatvāt apratipattyā kartavyanirṇayābhāvena mūḍhamanaskatvena dvitrādidaṇḍasthitiḥ /
analyzed: sarvāsu anurāga sāmyena kasya api upekṣā anarha tvāt apratipattyā kartavya nirṇaya abhāvena mūḍha manaska tvena dvitra ādi daṇḍa sthitiḥ
kṛta āgāḥ api niḥśaṅkaḥ tarjitaḥ pi na lajjitaḥ
dṛṣṭa doṣaḥ pi mithyā vāc kathitaḥ dhṛṣṭa nāyakaḥ
vijña priyā
vi kṛta āgāḥ api iti āga uparādhaḥ
mithyā vāc kṛtasya api mithyātva vādī
yathā mama

original: śoṇaṃ vīkṣya mukhaṃ vicumbitumahaṃ yātaḥ samīpaṃ tataḥ pādena prahṛtaṃ tayā,
analyzed: śoṇam vīkṣya mukham vicumbitum aham yātaḥ samīpam tatas pādena prahṛtam tayā
sapadi tam dhṛtvā sa hāse mayi
kiñcid tatra vidhātum akṣama tayā bāṣpam sṛjantyāḥ sakhe
dhyātaḥ cetasi kautukam vitanute vāma bhruvaḥ
vijña priyā

original: (vi, ḍha) śoṇaṃ vīkṣyeti---roṣāruṇamukhīṃ priyāṃ cumbituṃ gatasya tayā prahartumudyataṃ
analyzed: vi ḍha śoṇam vīkṣya iti roṣa aruṇa mukhīm priyām cumbitum gatasya tayā prahartum udyatam

original: pādaṃ dhṛtvā kiñcit kartumakṣamīkṛtāṃ rudatīṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā hasitavato nāyakasya sakhyau
analyzed: pādam dhṛtvā kiñcid kartum akṣamīkṛtām rudatīm tām dṛṣṭvā hasitavataḥ nāyakasya sakhyau
vṛttānta kathanam idam
atra nāyikā krodha vaśāt nāyakasya kṛta āgaḥ tva siddhiḥ
locanā
samīpam yātaḥ nunaya ādikam a kṛtvā api iti bhāvaḥ
anukūlaḥ eka nirataḥ
ekasyām eva nāyikāyām āsaktaḥ nukūla nāyakaḥ
yathā
asmākam sakhi
vāsasī na rucire
graiveyakam na ujjvalam
no vakrā gātiḥ uddhatam na hasitam
na eva asti
kaścid madaḥ

original: kintvanye 'pi janā vadanti subhago 'pyasyāḥ priyo nānyato dṛṣṭaṃ nikṣipatīti viśvamiyatā manyāmahe duḥsthitam //
analyzed: kintu anye janāḥ vadanti subhagaḥ pi asyāḥ priyaḥ na anyatas dṛṣṭam nikṣipati iti viśvam iyatā manyāmahe duḥsthitam
vijña priyā

original: (vi, ṇa) asmākaṃ sakhīti--paṣyau subhagāyā sakhyā uktiriyam /
analyzed: vi na asmākam subhagāyāḥ sakhyāḥ uktiḥ iyam
vastra aujjvalya ādikam saubhāgya hetuḥ mama nā asti

original: kintu na kevalamahamanyepi janā vadanti asyāḥ patiranyato 'nyasyāṃ nāyikāyāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ na nikṣipatīti /
analyzed: kintu na kevalam aham anye api janāḥ vadanti asyāḥ patiḥ anyatas nyasyām nāyikāyām dṛṣṭim na nikṣipati iti
viśvam etat viśva varti strī janam duḥ sthitam

original: mayi asūyayā madapekṣayā saubhāgyālpatvena vā duḥ sthitaṃ vayaṃ manyāmahe /
analyzed: mayi asūyayā mad apekṣayā saubhāgya alpatvena vā duḥ sthitam vayam manyāmahe
patiḥ kīdṛśaḥ
subhagaḥ upi saundaryeṇa anya nāyikā abhilaṣaṇīya tva rūpa saubhāgyavān api iti arthaḥ
locanā
anyatas anyasyām vinā iti arthaḥ
viśvam dus sthitam manyāmahe
kintu mām eva suṃsthitām iti bhāvaḥ
graiveyakam
kaṇṭha ābharaṇam
madaḥ api yauvana ādi ahaṅkāra janitaḥ garvaḥ api nā eva asti
śaṭhaḥ yam ekatra baddha bhāvaḥ yaḥ
darśita bahis anurāgaḥ vipriyam anyatra gūḍham ācarati

original: yaḥ punarekasyāmeva nāyikāyāṃ baddhabhāvo dvayorapi nāyikayorbahirdarśitānurāgo 'nyasyāṃ nāyikāyāṃ gūḍhaṃ vipriyamācarita sa śaṭhaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ punar ekasyām eva nāyikāyām baddha bhāvaḥ dvayoḥ api nāyikayoḥ bahis darśita anurāgaḥ nyasyām nāyikāyām gūḍham vipriyam ācarita sa śaṭhaḥ
yathā
śaṭāni asyāḥ kāñcī maṇi raṇitam ākarṇya sahasā yadā āśliṣyan eva praśithila bhuja granthiḥ abhavaḥ

original: tadetatkvācakṣe ghṛtamadhumayatvadvahuvaco- viṣeṇāghūrṇantī kimapi na sakhī me gaṇayati” //
analyzed: tat etat kva ācakṣe ghṛta madhu maya tvad vahu vacaḥ viṣeṇa āghūrṇantī kim api na sakhī me gaṇayati
vijña priyā

original: (vi, ta) śaṭhānyasyā iti---nāyikāyā vipriyakāriṇaṃ nāyakaṃ bhartsayantyā sakhyā uktiriyam /
analyzed: vi te śaṭhāni asyāḥ iti nāyikāyāḥ vipriya kāriṇam nāyakam bhartsayantyā sakhyāḥ uktiḥ iyam

original: he śaṭha / mama sakhīm āśliṣyanneva tvaṃ yadanyasyā nāyikāyāḥ kāñcīmaṇiraṇitaśabdamākarṇya sahasā praśithilabhujagranthiḥ (vāhuveṣṭanaṃ)
analyzed: he śaṭha mama sakhīm āśliṣyan eva tvam yat anyasyāḥ nāyikāyāḥ kāñcīmaṇi raṇita śabdam ākarṇya sahasā praśithila bhuja granthiḥ vāhu veṣṭanam
abhavaḥ tat etat kva jane ācakṣe

original: ato me sakhī ghṛtamadhumayena miśritaghṛtamadhurūpeṇa tvadīyabahucāṭuvacoviṣeṇāghūrṇantī kimapi kartavyaṃ na gaṇayatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: atas me sakhī ghṛta madhu mayena miśrita ghṛta madhu rūpeṇa tvadīya bahu cāṭu vacaḥ viṣeṇa āghūrṇantī kim api kartavyam na gaṇayati iti arthaḥ
miśrita ghṛta madhunī hi āpāta madhure api viṣa tvam prāpnutaḥ
eṣām ca traividhyāt uttama madhya adhama tvena
uktāḥ nāyaka bhedāḥ catvāriṃśat tathā aṣṭau ca
vijña priyā
vi thaḥ eṣām ca iti eṣām uttama madhyama adhama tvena trauvidhyāt iti anvayaḥ
catvāriṃśat iti ṣoḍaśa traiguṇyena aṣṭacatvāriśat
eṣām ukta ṣoḍaśa bhedānām
atha prasaṅgāt eteṣām sahāyān āha
vijña priyā

original: (vi, da) atha prasaṅgāditi---atra eṣāmityanena nāyakamātrasyaiva parāmarśo natu prakānta śṛṅgārīyāṣṭacatvāriṃśata eva /
analyzed: atha prasaṅgāt iti atra eṣām iti anena nāyaka mātrasya eva parāmarśaḥ na tu prakānta śṛṅgārīya aṣṭacatvāriṃśataḥ eva

original: ata eva rāmasya sugrīvaḥ sahāyo darśayiṣyate /
analyzed: atas eva rāmasya sugrīvaḥ sahāyaḥ darśayiṣyate
locanā
prasaṅgāt iti
eṣām hi sahāya yukta tvena kārya kāri tve dhika rasa paripoṣaḥ
evam anyatra
dūra anuvartini syāt tasya prāsaṅgika iti vṛtte tu
kiñcid tad guṇa hīnaḥ sahāyaḥ eva asya pīṭhamardda ākhyaḥ
tasya nāyakasya bahu vyāpini prasaṅga saṃgate iti vṛtte nantara uktaiḥ nāyaka sāmānya guṇaiḥ
locanā
nāyaka sāmānya guṇaiḥ tyāga ādibhiḥ
kiñcid ūnaḥ pīṭhamardda nāmā sahāyaḥ bhavati
yathā ā rāmacandra ādīnām sugrīva ādayaḥ
vijña priyā

original: (vi, dha) dūrānuvartinīti vyācaṣṭe---tasyeti dūrānuvartini ityasya vyākhyā bahuvyāpinīti bahudeśavyāpyasādhye ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: dūra anuvartinī iti vyācaṣṭe tasya iti dūra anuvartini iti asya vyākhyā bahu vyāpini iti bahu deśa vyāpya sādhye iti arthaḥ
upasthitaḥ iti vṛtte vṛttānte
kiñcid tad guṇa hīnaḥ iti asya artham āha anantara iti anantara uktaiḥ pūrva uktaiḥ
atha śṛṅgārasahāyāḥ
śṛṅgāre sya sahāyāḥ viṭa ceṭa vidūṣaka ādyāḥ syuḥ

original: bhaktā narmasu nipuṇāḥ kupitavadhūmānabhañjanāḥ śuddhāḥ // VisSd_3.40 //
analyzed: bhaktāḥ narmasu nipuṇāḥ kupita vadhū māna bhañjanāḥ śuddhāḥ
ādi śabdāt mālākāra rajaka tāmbūlika gāndhika ādayaḥ
tatra viṭaḥ
saṃbhoga hīna saṃpad viṭaḥ tu dhūrttaḥ kalā eka deśa jñaḥ

original: veśopacārakuśalo vāggmī madhuro 'tha bahumato goṣṭhyām // VisSd_3.41 //
analyzed: veśa upacāra kuśalaḥ bahu mataḥ goṣṭhyām
vijña priyā
vi na nāyaka sāmānya guṇaiḥ tyāga ādibhiḥ
ceṭaḥ prasiddhaḥ eva
vijña priyā
ceṭaḥ prasiddhaḥ iti ceṭī putraḥ iti arthaḥ
kusuma vasanta ādi abhidhaḥ karma vapuḥ veṣa bhāṣā ādyaiḥ
hāsya karaḥ kalaha ratiḥ vidūṣakaḥ syāt sva karma jñaḥ
vijña priyā
vi vidūṣakam āha kusuma iti
karma ādibhiḥ hāsya karaḥ iti anvayaḥ
karmaṇā vapuṣā
veśena
vāsanadinā bhāṣā ādyaiḥ sarveṣām hāsyam janayati
locanā
kusuma iti kusuma abhidhaḥ vidūṣakaḥ rasālaka ādiḥ
sva karma hāsya ādi
artha cintane sahāyam āha
vijña priyā
rasīya nāyaka sahāya kathana prasaṅgāt anyatra api sahāyam āha artha cintana iti
mantrī syāt arthānām cintāyām
arthāḥ tantra avāpa ādayaḥ
vijña priyā
vi bha tantrā avāpa iti
tantram rāja kṛtyam tasya āvāpaḥ yogya ayogya anuṣṭhānam
tasmin arthe mantrī sahāyaḥ iti arthaḥ
yat tu atra sahāya kathana prastāve

original: “mantrī svaṃ cobhayaṃ vāpi sakhā tasyārthacintane” iti kenācillakṣaṇaṃ kṛtam,
analyzed: mantrī svam ca ubhayam vā api sakhā tasya artha cintane iti kena acid lakṣaṇam kṛtam
tat api rājñaḥ ūrtha cintana upāya lakṣaṇa prakaraṇaḥ lakṣayitavyam
na tu sahāya kathana prakaraṇaḥ

original: “nāyakasyārthacintane mantrī sahāyaḥ” ityukte 'pi nāyakasyārthata eva siddhatvāt /
analyzed: nāyakasya artha cintane mantrī sahāyaḥ iti ukte nāyakasya arthataḥ eva siddha tvāt
vijña priyā

original: (vi, ma) svaṃ ceti--svaṃ rājā tasya rājñaḥ /
analyzed: vi me svam cetisvam rājā tasya rājñaḥ
kenacid iti lakṣaṇam sahāya jñāpanam

original: atra svasyāpi sahāyatvena kathanāt pūrvasmād bhedaḥ /
analyzed: atra svasya api sahāya tvena kathanāt pūrvasmāt bhedaḥ
sahāya kathana prakaraṇe iti svasya sva sahāya tvāt sahāya tāyāḥ
nanu evam tena cintā na kriyatām iti āha nāyakasya iti
yat api uktam
mantriṇām lalitaḥ śeṣāḥ mantriṣu āyatta siddhayaḥ iti
tat api sva lakṣaṇa kathanena eka lakṣitasya dhīra lalitasya mantri mātra āyatta artha cintana upapatteḥ gatārtham
na ca artha cintane tasya mantrī sahāyaḥ
kim tu svayam eva saṃpādakaḥ
tasya artha cintana ādi abhāvāt
vijña priyā

original: (vi, ya) mantriṇeti---lalito dhīralalitastādṛśo rājā mantriṇaivārthasādhakaḥ iti śeṣaḥ,
analyzed: vi ya mantriṇā iti lalitaḥ dhīra lalitaḥ tādṛśaḥ rājā mantriṇā eva artha sādhakaḥ iti śeṣaḥ
svasya śṛṅgāra nirata tvāt
śeṣāḥ dhīra udātta dhīra uddhata ādayaḥ
sva lakṣaṇa kathanena iti
dhīra lalita lakṣaṇa kathanena iti arthaḥ

original: “niścinto mṛduraniśaṃ kalāparo dhīralalitaḥ syāditi dhīralalitalakṣaṇe niścintetvainārthacintanasya mantrimātraniṣṭhatvasiddhestasya mantriṇaḥ  #
analyzed: niścintaḥ mṛduḥ aniśam kalā paraḥ dhīra lalitaḥ syāt iti dhīra lalita lakṣaṇe mantri mātra niṣṭha tva siddheḥ tasya mantriṇaḥ
sahāya tā kathanam gatārtham iti arthaḥ
dhīra lalitasya yaḥ mantrī tasya svayam eva artha cintaka tvam
na tu sva cintane tasya sahāya tvam
sphuṭam eva āha na ca artha cintanam iti tasya artha cintana ādi abhāvāt iti atra tasya dhīra lalitasya

original: ayaṃ mantrī syādarthānāṃ cintāyāmiti sūtrasya parabhāgaḥ /
analyzed: ayam mantrī syāt arthānām cintāyām iti sūtrasya para bhāgaḥ
locanā
yad tu atra iti yad tu atra ityādeḥ gatārtha tvam iti anena anvayaḥ
tasya granthasya ayam arthaḥ
sahāya kathana prastāve mantriṇaḥ eva sahāya tva kathanam yuktam
na tu ātmanaḥ ubhayasya vā
ātmanaḥ eva ātma sahāya tvam viruddham

original: kintu rājā kenārthacintanaṃ kuryādityapekṣāyāmeva kvacin mantriṇā kvacidātmanā,
analyzed: kintu rājā kena artha cintanam kuryāt iti apekṣāyām eva kvacid mantriṇā kvacid ātmanā
kvacid ubhayena iti vaktum yuktam
dhīra lalitasya niścinta tva ādi rūpa kathanena mantri mātra āyatta artha cintanam upapadyate
kiñca tat api artha cintana upāya prakaraṇe eva lakṣitavyam
na tu sahāya kathana prakaraṇe
tasya dhīra lalitasya na ca sahāyaḥ saḥ
mantriṇaḥ sahāya tve dhīra lalitasya api artha cintana prasaṅgāt
atha antar pura sahāyāḥ
tadvat avarodhe
vāmana śaṇḍha kirāta mleccha ābhīrāḥ śakāra kubja ādyaḥ
mada mūrkha tā abhimānī duṣkula tā aiśvarya saṃyuktaḥ

original: so 'yamanūḍhābhrātā rājñaḥ śyālaḥ śakāra ityuktaḥ // VisSd_3.44 //
analyzed: saḥ yamanūḍhā bhrātā rājñaḥ śyālaḥ śakāraḥ iti uktaḥ
vijña priyā
vi ra śakāra lakṣaṇam āha mada iti

original: duṣkulatā aiśvaryaṃ ca tābhyāṃ saṃyuktopi madamūrkhatābhyāmabhimānītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: duṣkula tā aiśvaryam ca tābhyām saṃyuktaḥ api mada mūrkha tābhyām abhimānī iti arthaḥ
locanā
ā śakāra svarūpam āha mada iti madaḥ garvaḥ
madya vikāraḥ vā
ādya śabdāt mūka ādayaḥ
tatra śaṇḍha vāmana kirāta kubja ādayaḥ yathā ratnābalyām

original: naṣṭaṃ varṣavarairmanuṣyagaṇanābhāvādapāsya trapā- mantaḥ kañcukikañcukasya viśati trāsādayaṃ vāmanaḥ /
analyzed: naṣṭam varṣavaraiḥ manuṣya gaṇanā bhāvāt apāsya trapāḥ mantaḥ kañcuki kañcukasya viśati trāsāt ayam vāmanaḥ

paryakūji sa rujā iva taruṇyāḥ tāra lola valayena kareṇa
vijña priyā

original: (vi, kṣa) pallavopamiti iti---abhīṣṭe priye 'dharabimbaṃ daṣṭavati sati arthāt niṣedhārthaṃ dhūyamānena kareṇa paryyakūjītyanvayaḥ /

tat utprekṣate sa rujā iva iti

upamiti arthena sāmyena pallava sapakṣam

itarat padam

original: “mā garvamudvaha kapolatale cakāsti kāntasvahastalikhitā mama mañjarīti /
